Dhoop Dewar (|lit=Sunny Wall}}) is a 1982 Pakistani television long play written by Younus Javed and it was produced and directed by Mohammad Nisar Hussain.
Synopsis
The story is about Nargis, Roshan, Salman and Asad. Roshan is a rich girl from a wealthy family while Salman belongs to a middle-class family. They both want to get married but their marriage is not accepted by Amjad who is Roshan's father. Later Nargis a teacher at a college and from a good well educated family marries him but due to Salman's behaviour it causes problems between them. Their child Asad faces a hard time after his parents separates due to Salman's nature.
